description:
How can adorable and steamy be rolled in to one package?
Kurt is one of those guys who is now doing amateur adult video as a full on career.
One of the things that is hard for these guys, is if they work for several major sites, then none of the other sites want to pick them up due to over exposure. I think that is shame. I might feel differently in the future, but I have my photography to fall back on, and despite them being photographed/videoed many times before, I feel like I can bring a unique look to the table...er...bed.
Kurt's got a girlfriend and kids at home - at 19! He is about 5'7" and weighs about 125 pounds. I think 5 of those pounds are in his dick. His dick is long, but it's thick, almost as if he can't get his fist around it. And I think he is a true exhibitionist, really enjoying when people are looking at him- guys or girls.
This shoot was totally last minute. His manager said he needed some work, and I had a free weekend, so we got him out quick. He stayed with me since I couldn't make hotel arrangements that quick, and for the first time I was a little unnerved having a hot sexy young guy a couple bedrooms doorways down the hall.
You will definitely being seeing a lot more of Kurt on ChaosMen.com!
title: Kurt Wild - Solo
